text: @johncardillo That is likely Dr Li Wenliang who tried to warn associates about the Coronavirus. He was eventually arrested for unauthorized discussion of a potential crisis. The authorities claim he was later afflicted by the disease and died.

entity.name: Wuhan Central Hospital denies death of coronavirus whistleblower Li Wenliang
